channel.title: [Help] Changing a npc Direction [Help]
channel.description:
Hi guys how do i change a npc direction to north and not south Auto spawn code used //------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
spawn = 409 3223 3216 0 -2 0 2 2 1 genie
Ps - The code is under the right heading it's just mopar that does it on on the froum :(
By
[shadow=red,left][b][u]J[/u][/b][/shadow][shadow=red,left][b][u]C[/u][/b][/shadow][u][b][shadow=red,left]-scape[/shadow][/b][/u]-[shadow=red,left][u][b]Pk[/b][/u][/shadow]

item.description:

[quote=“Mod Skill09, post:9, topic:286657”]spawn = 409 3223 3216 0 0 0 0 0 1 genie : use that[/quote] I DID COMPILED AND RUN AND IT SAID Unlimited-pkz
Is now online!

item.description:
@xxlifeskilxx wrote:

There has currently been alot of this type of topic. If the NPC s not walking, you can always cast a spell on it to turn the other way. Ice barrage would be the best, IDK maybe it will work.

item.title: [Help] Changing a npc Direction [Help]
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Skill09 Mod Skill09
item.description:
@Mod_Skill09 wrote:

ok, i got it. Change the range co-ords, you have them wrong. set to 0 to make it not walk, or make sure they are similar to where the npc is standing other it will explore the entire world:) pl0x

Read full topic
